name: 30 Second Quest
description:
This is my first time making a game for gamejam and was glad to join this one when I had the chance. Honestly the videos Matthew Palaje makes made me more inspired to be an indie developer.

Controls: you can walk with WASD and jump using space, attack with right mouse click.

Objective: try to find all the key and find a glowing hole to proceed to the next level
